channel.title: 508 Client Backround
channel.description: Hey guys. I need Some help changing the backround on Fearny pks 508 v2 client. All hellp will be greatly appreciated.

item.title: 508 Client Backround
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

Sprites.idx is the index file for Sprites.dat (the data file). Pretty much, the client reads Sprites.idx to find what and where certain pieces of data are within Sprites.dat. So far, I’m pretty sure 508’s and later are stuck in the stone age (not much model editing, sprite editing, etc.), especially if its HD. Atm, I’m trying to fully decompile my 508 HD so i can edit the cache, but it may take some time. :|.

Best of luck to ya. So to answer your question, i dont think its possible ATM, but i may be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client Backround
item.dc:creator: @deadlysinn deadlysinn
item.description:
@deadlysinn wrote:

That would be for a 317. There arn’t any folders named “Sprites” though. The only files named “Sprites” are Sprites.dat and Sprites.idx =/.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client Backround
item.dc:creator: @L0ST_PK3R L0ST PK3R
item.description:
@L0ST_PK3R wrote:

Okay, go to client then i think it’s the same or may be different. (well i defenetly know it’s sprites on a 317) But look through the files/folders and look for like pictures of backgrounds and skulls, and right click the background one and click ‘Edit’ then you can customiz you’r own on Paint or more.
